meanings.definition: Resembling ivy in growth or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The ivylike vines covered the old stone wall.
meanings.sent2: Her dress had an ivylike pattern that reminded me of nature.
meanings.sent3: The ivylike plant seemed to be trying to hug the tree next to it.
meanings.sent4: The ivylike tendrils reached out as if searching for something to hold onto.
meanings.sent5: The garden was filled with ivylike plants that added a touch of greenery.

meanings.sent1: The ivylike leaves were glossy and green.
meanings.sent2: The house had an ivylike charm that made it feel cozy.
meanings.sent3: She had an ivylike ability to adapt to any situation.
meanings.sent4: His ivylike persistence paid off in the end.
meanings.sent5: The ivylike tendrils wrapped around the fence, creating a natural barrier.

meanings.sent1: The ivylike plant crept up the side of the building.
meanings.sent2: The ivylike vines twisted and turned as they climbed higher.
meanings.sent3: The ivylike growth seemed to have a mind of its own.
meanings.sent4: Her hair cascaded down her back in an ivylike manner.
meanings.sent5: The ivylike tendrils swayed gently in the breeze, reaching for the sunlight.
